revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #44 Coba |image = [[File:Coba.png]] |caption = This Berry is said to be a new kind that is a cross of two Berries brought together by winds from far away. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 29 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,800 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} '''Coba''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with between 10 and 15 points of dry, between 15 and 20 points of bitter, and 0 points of all other flavors. The [[Chesto]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 hours 30 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 4 hours 30 mins || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CobaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CobaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
